description._content:
Caption:  Front Row L to R: Art Driedger, Bolivia; Raul Rosado, P.R.;  Blas Palacios, Honduras; Glen Musselman, Brazil; Ernesto Suarez, Uruguay; Agustin Darino, Argentina; Armando Hernandez, GC Columbia.
Second row: Mrs. Howard Habegger, Bobota; James Kratz, Elkhart MBM; Lester Hershey, P.R.; Alvin Voth, MB Cali, Columbia; Mr & Mrs Elmer Heatwole, visitors from Virginia; Nelson Litwiller, Conference Coordinator; J.Delbert Erb, Argentina; Mrs & Mrs Elmer Lehman, Costa Rica.   
Third row: Howard Habegger, GC Bogota; James, Hess, Honduras; Jakob Dyck, Paraguay Colonies; Claude Good, Mexico; Paul Kraybill, Salunga Bd; Edgar Stoesz, MCC Akron; Marietta Zimmerman, Dominican Republic; John H. Yoder, guest; Mrs. Glendon Claussen, Bogota; Ernst Harder, Pres. of Seminary in Uruguay. 

Citation:  Mennonite Board of Missions Photograph Collection.  Mission to Brazil,  1958-1965. IV-10-7.2  Box 2 Folder 20, Photo #47.   Mennonite Church USA Archives - Goshen. Goshen, Indiana.
